item.title: Changing the appearance of your character?
item.dc:creator: @Rofflecakes Rofflecakes
item.description:
@Rofflecakes wrote:

I started my server, and my brother and I have been playing for a while now, but i’ve noticed that every new character i create looks exactly the same.

Same hair, same shirt, pants etc. Is there a smidgen of code anyone could give me to change this? I thought i found it once, when it said [code]
//Setting player standard look
playerLook[0] = 3;
playerLook[1] = 6;
playerLook[2] = 7;
playerLook[3] = 8;
playerLook[4] = 4;
playerLook[5] = 1;

	/*playerLook[0] = 1;
	playerLook[1] = 5;
	playerLook[2] = 5;
	playerLook[3] = 6;
	playerLook[4] = 5;
	playerLook[5] = 10;*/

	//Giving the player an unique look
	playerEquipment[playerHat]=Item.randomHat();
	playerEquipment[playerCape]=Item.randomCape();
	playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=Item.randomAmulet();
	playerEquipment[playerChest]=Item.randomBody();
	playerEquipment[playerShield]=Item.randomShield();
	playerEquipment[playerLegs]=Item.randomLegs();
	playerEquipment[playerHands]=Item.randomGloves();
	playerEquipment[playerFeet]=Item.randomBoots();
	playerEquipment[playerRing]=Item.randomRing();
	playerEquipment[playerArrows]=Item.randomArrows();
	playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=1275;[/code]

…In Player.java, but i couldn’t work out how decipher the numbers.

Any help would be groovy.
Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Changing the appearance of your character?
